official-title.#text:
Directing the Secretary of Defense to transmit to the House of Representatives copies of any emails
			 in the possession of the Department of Defense or the National Security
			 Agency that were transmitted to or from the email account(s) of former
			 Internal Revenue Service Exempt Organizations Division Director Lois
			 Lerner between January 2009 and April 2011.

sponsor.#tail: submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, no later than 14 days after the date of the adoption of
			 this resolution, copies of any electronic communication in the possession
			 of the

, or any
			 office that reports to the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Director of the National Security Agency

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
that was transmitted
			 to or from any electronic mail account(s) used by former

Exempt Organizations Division Director Lois Lerner at any time
			 between January 1, 2009, and April 30, 2011.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HRES 649 IH: Directing the Secretary of Defense to transmit to the House of Representatives copies of any emails in the possession of the Department of Defense or the National Security Agency that were transmitted to or from the email account(s) of former Internal Revenue Service Exempt Organizations Division Director Lois Lerner between January 2009 and April 2011.
